cause.description:
When the word wicca or witch is said, many people automatically think of satan and evil. The truth is most wiccans and witches are good, and believe in the 3 fold law, meaning that all energies you send out come back to you time three. Not ALL wiccans / witches are good. Not ALL wiccans / witches are evil. Wicca is a neo-pagan earth-based religion which roots back to our acient ancestors who lived by the cycles of universe.
1. "Wiccan law/rede" says it all.
2. Inform people of this "new" religion
cause.name: Awareness of Wicca
